1057:6: yasya upādātuḥ darśanaśravaṇaghrāṇarasanādīni vedanāsparśamanaskārādīni ca bhavanti,
1057:7: sa upādātā pūrvamebhya upādānebhyo'stīti sāṃmitīyā vadanti ||1||
1057:11: iha vidyamāna eva devadatto ghanopādānaṃ kurute nāvidyamāno vandhyātanayaḥ |
1057:12: evaṃ yadi tāvatpudgalo darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ vyavasthito na syāt,
1057:14: tasmādasti asau ghanātprāgeva sthitadevadattavat darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo yo'sya upādānaṃ kariṣyatīti ||2||
1057:17: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate'tha saḥ ||3||
1057:23: yaśca svakāraṇanirapekṣaḥ sa nirhetuko ghanādinirapekṣaḥ ghanikavannāstītyabhiprāyaḥ ||3||
1057:26: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ ||4||
1057:27: yadi manyase - darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ pudgalo nāmāsti,
1057:29: nanvevaṃ sati nirastasaṃśayamamūnyapi darśanādīni vinā pudgalena bhaviṣyanti |
1057:30: tathāhi devadatto ghanasaṃbandhātpūrvaṃ dhanavyatirikto vyavasthitaḥ san arthāntarabhūtameva pṛthaksiddhaṃ dhanamupādatte |
1057:36: tena ca kāryeṇa kiṃcit kāraṇamabhivyajyate bījākhyam - asyedaṃ kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti |
1057:37: evaṃ yadi kenaciddarśanādike nopādānena kaścidātmasvabhāvo'bhivyajyate asyāyamupādāteti,
1057:39: tadānīṃ syātparasparāpekṣayorupādānopādātroḥ siddhiḥ yadā tu upādātāraṃ vinā pṛthak siddhaṃ darśanādikamabhyupagamyate,
1057:41: iti na yuktametat - darśanādibhyaḥ pṛthagavasthita upādāteti ||5||
1057:43: yadi sarvebhyo darśanādibhya prāgavasthita ityabhyupagataṃ syāt,
1057:52: ucyate | etadapi na yuktaṃ darśanādirahitasya nirupādānasya nirhetukasya nirañjanasyā stitvāsaṃbhavāt |
1057:53: sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate |
1057:56: yo hi sarvebhyaḥ pūrvo na bhavati,
1057:58: tadyathā sarvebhyo vṛkṣebhya prāg vanaṃ nāsti,
1057:60: sarvāsāṃ ca sikatānāṃ tailajananābhāve sati ekaikasyā api sikatāyāstailaṃ nāsti |
1057:63: nanu sa sarvebhyo'pi pūrvaṃ evetyabhyupagataṃ bhavati |
1057:67: draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ |
1057:70: na ca yuktaṃ vaktuṃ sa eva draṣṭā sa eva śroteti |
1057:71: yadi syāt, tadā darśanakriyārahita syāpi śroturdraṣṭṭatvaṃ syāt,
1057:73: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yaddarśanakriyā rahito'pi draṣṭā syāt,
1057:76: iti | pratikriyaṃ ca kārakabhedātkuta etadevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti pratipādayannāha -evaṃ caitanna yujyata iti ||
1057:77: ācāryabuddhapālitastu vyācaṣṭe- ekatve hi ātmanaḥ indriyāntaragamanaprasaṅgaḥ puruṣasya syāt,
1057:79: asya ācāryabhāvaviveko dūṣaṇamāha - sarvagatasyātmano nendriyāntaragamanamastītyayuktaḥ prasaṅgadoṣa iti |
1057:88: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet ||9||
1057:89: tadyathā goranyo'śvaḥ na hi gavi sati na bhavati yaugapadyena,
1057:94: evaṃ sati bahava evātmānaḥ prāpnuvanti draṣṭṭaśrotṛvedakādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak siddhayupagamāt |
1057:95: tasmādekaikasmādapi darśanādeḥ pūrvaṃ nāsti pudgalo nāma kaścit ||9||
1057:96: atrāha - vidyata eva pūrvaṃ sa sarvebhyo darśanādibhya ātmā |
1057:99: iha darśanādibhyaḥ pūrvaṃ nāmarūpāvasthāyāṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni santi yataḥ kramānnāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanamiti darśanaśravaṇādīnyutpadyante |
1057:104: teṣvapi mahābhūtopādānanimittako'pyeṣa na yujyate pūrveṇaiva hetunetyabhiprāyaḥ |
1057:122: yasya darśanādīnyupādānaṃ sa yadā nāstīti pratipāditam ,
1057:126: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi ||11||
1057:127: yasya darśanādīni parikalpyante sa yadā nāstītyuktam,
1057:128: nanu tadaiva darśanādikamapi nāstīti spaṣṭamādarśitaṃ bhavati |
1057:146: prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca |
1057:158: yaścaivamātmā darśanādibhyaḥ prāk paścād yugapacca parīkṣyamāṇo nāsti,
1057:159: tasya idānīmanupalabdhasvabhāvasya astitvaṃ nāstitvaṃ vā kaḥ parikalpayetprājñaḥ ?
1057:160: tasmātkarmakārakavadeva upādānopādātroḥ parasparāpekṣā siddhirna svābhāvikīti sthitam ||
1057:165: na hi kaści jāyati na co mriyate ||
1057:166: na ca sattvu labhyati na jīvu naro
1057:170: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro
1057:172: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ
1057:174: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca uccheda puno
1057:175: na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ |
1057:177: na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate ||
1057:178: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ
1057:179: na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ |
